Package

strRegression

strRegression: Structure of Regression

Structure of Regression Functions

beta_of_sigmacap()

Regression Coefficients as a Function of the Covariance Matrix

betastar_of_rhocap()

Standardized Regression Coefficients as a Function of the Correlation Matrix

betastar_of_sigmacap()

Standardized Regression Coefficients as a Function of the Covariance Matrix

betastar_of_theta()

Standardized Regression Coefficients as a Function of the Vector of Regression Parameters

betastar_of_vechsigmacap()

Standardized Regression Coefficients as a Function of the Half-Vectorization of the Covariance Matrix

moments_helper()

Helper Function to Convert a Vector of Moments to the Mean Vector and Covariance Matrix

rsq()

R-Squared as a Function of Regression Parameters

rsq_of_sigmacap()

R-Squared as a Function of the Covariance Matrix

sigmasq()

Error Variance

sigmaysq()

Variance of the Regressand Variable

theta()

Parameters Assuming Stochastic Regressors as a Function of the Mean Vector and the Covariance Matrix

theta_helper()

Helper Function to Convert a Vector of Parameters to a List of Parameters

theta_of_moments()

Parameters Assuming Stochastic Regressors as a Function of the Mean Vector and the Covariance Matrix

theta_of_sigmacap()

Parameters Assuming Stochastic Regressors as a Function of the Covariance Matrix

theta_of_vechsigmacap()

Parameters Assuming Stochastic Regressors as a Function of the Half-Vectorization of the Covariance Matrix

thetastar()

Standardized Parameters Assuming Stochastic Regressors as a Function of the Covariance Matrix

thetastar_of_sigmacap()

Standardized Parameters Assuming Stochastic Regressors as a Function of the Covariance Matrix

Multivariate Normal Distribution Functions

rmvn_chol()

Generate Data from the Multivariate Normal Distribution Using the Cholesky Decomposition

Linear Algebra Functions

sym_of_vech()

Symmetric matrix A from vech(A)

sym_of_vechs()

Symmetric matrix A from vechs(A)

vech()

Half-Vectorize

vechnames()

Vector Names for Half-Vectorization

vechs()

Strict Half-Vectorize

vechsnames()

Vector Names for Strict Half-Vectorization
